home.title: Mayusc: online tool to correct and transform texts easily
home.intro: Mayusc is a free web tool designed to help you transform, correct, and improve texts quickly and easily. It's designed for people who work with text daily and need immediate results without complications.
home.intro2: Unlike other platforms, Mayusc allows you to convert text to uppercase or lowercase, improve writing, and correct common errors without registration. The entire process is done directly in the browser, prioritizing user privacy and convenience.
home.intro3: This platform is ideal for both one-time uses and repetitive editing tasks, offering a clear, direct experience focused on productivity.

whatIsItFor.title: What is Mayusc for?
whatIsItFor.intro: Mayusc is used to simplify tasks related to text editing. With this tool you can:

features.convert: Convert text to uppercase or lowercase in seconds
features.improve: Improve the clarity and style of a text
features.prepare: Prepare content for academic work, social media, or professional documents

whatIsItFor.goal: Its main goal is to save time and reduce errors in texts of any length.

whoCanUse.title: Who can use Mayusc?
whoCanUse.intro: Mayusc is designed for different types of users, including:

users.students: Students, who need to correct assignments and homework
users.creators: Content creators, who seek to improve the quality of their texts
users.professionals: Professionals, who write emails, reports, or documents
users.social: People who work with social media, where text formatting is key

whoCanUse.noTech: No technical knowledge is required to use the platform.

howItWorks.title: How Mayusc works
howItWorks.description: Mayusc works very simply. You just need to paste your text in the corresponding area, select the action you want to perform, and get the result instantly.
howItWorks.simple: There are no complex processes or unnecessary steps. The tool is designed so that anyone can use it from the first moment, without a learning curve.

advantages.title: Advantages of using Mayusc over other tools
advantages.description: One of the main advantages of Mayusc is its focus on simplicity and privacy. Unlike many similar tools, it doesn't require creating an account or sharing personal information.
advantages.updates: Additionally, the platform is constantly updated to improve correction accuracy and offer a better user experience. All this makes it a reliable option for daily work with texts.

privacy.title: Privacy and security
privacy.description: Privacy is a priority at Mayusc. Texts entered by the user are processed locally and are not stored on external servers. This ensures that information remains secure and confidential at all times.
privacy.important: This feature is especially important for those who work with sensitive texts or private information.

q1.question: Is Mayusc free?
q1.answer: Yes, all main features of Mayusc are completely free.

q2.question: Do I need to register to use the tool?
q2.answer: No. You can use Mayusc without creating an account.

q3.question: Does it work on mobile phones and tablets?
q3.answer: Yes, the tool is compatible with mobile devices and adapts to different screen sizes.

q4.question: Does it save my texts?
q4.answer: No. Mayusc does not store or share the texts you enter.

home.closing: Mayusc is a practical solution for anyone who needs to work with texts quickly, securely, and efficiently. If you're looking for a simple, free tool focused on productivity, Mayusc is an excellent option.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Last updated: December 29, 2025

Welcome to Mayusc.lat. We take your privacy very seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website.

1. Information We Collect

Currently, Mayusc.lat does not directly collect personally identifiable data from its users. We do not require registration or login.

2. Google AdSense and Cookies

We use Google AdSense to display ads on our website. Google, as a third-party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads on your site.

  • The use of the Google advertising cookie enables it and its partners to serve ads to users based on their visits to your sites and/or other sites on the Internet.
  • Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings.

3. Log Files

Like most websites, we automatically collect certain information and store it in log files. This information may include Internet Protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp, and clickstream data. This data is used to analyze trends and administer the site.

4. Changes to This Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We encourage you to review this page periodically for any changes.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content:
A cookie is a small text file that a website saves on your computer or mobile device when you visit the site.

How do we use cookies?

We use cookies to:

  • Enable certain functions of the website.
  • Provide analytics.
  • Store your preferences.
  • Enable advertisements delivery, including behavioral advertising.

Third-party Cookies

In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-parties cookies to report usage statistics of the website, deliver advertisements on and through the website, and so on. Specifically, we use Google AdSense, which uses cookies to improve advertising.

Controlling Cookies

You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.
